column4: Does anyone know of a simplified word processor for Ubuntu? Something similar to 'wordpad'?
Abiword is too bloated for you?
Supposedly I can't install Abiword on my machine -- some sort of conflict.
what does it say in the error message?
I am on Windows now since I cannot connect to the internet on Ubuntu at the moment -- I have an internal dial-up modem. I'll read it an log back on.
AbiWord cannot be installed on your computer (i386). Either the application requires special hardware features or the vendor decided to not support your computer type.
are you running an 64bit ubuntu or smthn?
perhaps I have to be connected to the net?
yes you will, it is not on the install CD
That could very well be the problem
ah, I see. I'll have to wait until I purchase my external modem -- granted the internal simply does not work.
